body:
On 2011-12-13 18:27:56 +0000, Greg Ward said:


> The (Lu,Lv) coordinates are extracted and interpolated from the vertex 
> texture ('vt') coordinates in the .OBJ file.  These are usually 
> produced by the modeling system when the texture is applied.  You can 
> refer to the obj2mesh man page:
> 
> 	http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/man_html/obj2mesh.1.html
> 
> -Greg


D'oh!


I will Read The Fine Manual. :~)


Randolph
___
